value:
I know not why, but...I can allow
neither you nor this world to remain
as they are now...

A prince of light... A hero of shadow...
The light's strength rises to meet the
growing darkness...

You, too, follow a mysterious path...
That is why I was called here...

Stand still... Look deep into my eyes...
Yes, like that...into my soul itself...

A...meal? You need not worry about
me. I need only to rest from time to
time...

Another walking a mysterious path...
Just like $Nf...

I am Nagi... I carry the will of the
divine dragon. Tell me...what is
your name?

You are a mysterious person, walking
a mysterious path...$k$pThe power flowing within you,
hidden... It is most significant.$k$pI know not how to express this feeling
in words, and yet...I understand it.$k$pThat is why I must remain here...
For you.$k$pYes... For you. To give you what
you need is...everything I am.
I will finish what I started...
My name is Nagi. Who...are you?
There is little I can recollect… Only that I was called to this place.
A sinister presence is at work... I can sense it in this world as well...
I know one thing—I must finish what I started...
Your souls called out to me, begging for my help...
